Introduction
This topic contains information on developing for P&T disability and age, including
when a rating determination of P&T disability is not required
acceptable evidence of age
Social Security disability evidence and Share verification
determining disability effective date based on Social Security information
when a rating determination of P&T disability is required
acceptable medical evidence and definition of adequate medical evidence for pension rating purposes
VA examination authorization
obtaining evidence before referring a claim to the rating activity
action to take when medical evidence is not received
, and
developing for unemployability
.
